Text: For those who missed something in the past

Those who missed something in the past are fools. It's a highlight every wekk for me! Thanks my friend in the name of all the other deaf, thumb and blind kids. Go on playing the magic ball for us. Beaujoulais

beaujoulais
Thank you for your continuous support 
and  I truly hope our virtual friendship will never stop

pupo - surely your efforts rank up there as one of the greatest singular uploading accomplishments in the history of P2P.
I am humbled by your dedication to keeping the magic alive and I offer my sincere gratitude & respects in support of the hope you will continue.

Hi sweetchuk
Thanks for expressing your intrest for my "History of pop and rock music" and for your wonderful words!
